text.content: 1. Product Design Case Study

rich_text.plain_text: 1. Product Design Case Study

text.content: 1.1 Chalk 3.0 Global Product Design

rich_text.plain_text: 1.1 Chalk 3.0 Global Product Design

text.content: My Role: Project Proposer + Product Designer

rich_text.plain_text: My Role: Project Proposer + Product Designer

text.content: Project Background

rich_text.plain_text: Project Background

text.content: "Seiue Campus Chalk" is an innovative campus management system covering all scenarios, deeply serving quality innovative schools such as Peking University Affiliated High School, Tsinghua University Affiliated High School, Beijing No.4 High School, The Affiliated High School of Peking University, Guangzhou Middle School, Shenzhen Middle School, and other top innovative schools. In recent years, the product development hit a bottleneck, as the old technical architecture and product framework could not support new business expansion.

rich_text.plain_text: "Seiue Campus Chalk" is an innovative campus management system covering all scenarios, deeply serving quality innovative schools such as Peking University Affiliated High School, Tsinghua University Affiliated High School, Beijing No.4 High School, The Affiliated High School of Peking University, Guangzhou Middle School, Shenzhen Middle School, and other top innovative schools. In recent years, the product development hit a bottleneck, as the old technical architecture and product framework could not support new business expansion.

text.content: During a performance review, I proposed making global interaction framework optimizations based on version 2.0 to solve usability and functional structure issues. The company formed a front-end design team for me, launching the "Experience Optimization Plan."

rich_text.plain_text: During a performance review, I proposed making global interaction framework optimizations based on version 2.0 to solve usability and functional structure issues. The company formed a front-end design team for me, launching the "Experience Optimization Plan."

text.content: After running the plan for a month, we realized that many problems couldn't be truly solved through experience-layer framework optimization alone. We needed to rethink from the product and technology core, building a new product framework. Thus, the Chalk 3.0 plan was officially launched.

rich_text.plain_text: After running the plan for a month, we realized that many problems couldn't be truly solved through experience-layer framework optimization alone. We needed to rethink from the product and technology core, building a new product framework. Thus, the Chalk 3.0 plan was officially launched.

text.content: Current Problem Analysis

rich_text.plain_text: Current Problem Analysis

text.content: We conducted research on core scenarios with several key client schools, reviewed the old system, analyzed issues in the usage process, and identified potential problems in supporting new product goals:

rich_text.plain_text: We conducted research on core scenarios with several key client schools, reviewed the old system, analyzed issues in the usage process, and identified potential problems in supporting new product goals:

text.content: Product Design Strategy

rich_text.plain_text: Product Design Strategy

text.content: Building Universal Tools for Rapid Scenario Coverage

rich_text.plain_text: Building Universal Tools for Rapid Scenario Coverage

text.content: In the new system, we extracted various universal tools such as approval workflows, questionnaires, and general groups to support similar scenarios, covering a wide range of key campus business scenarios.

rich_text.plain_text: In the new system, we extracted various universal tools such as approval workflows, questionnaires, and general groups to support similar scenarios, covering a wide range of key campus business scenarios.

text.content: For example: leave requests, teaching evaluations, volunteer surveys, administrative classes, dormitories, and other scenarios could all be built using universal tools.

rich_text.plain_text: For example: leave requests, teaching evaluations, volunteer surveys, administrative classes, dormitories, and other scenarios could all be built using universal tools.

text.content: Plug-in Architecture for Greater Flexibility

rich_text.plain_text: Plug-in Architecture for Greater Flexibility

text.content: To reduce system coupling, better manage customer requirements, and increase system flexibility...

rich_text.plain_text: To reduce system coupling, better manage customer requirements, and increase system flexibility...

text.content: Chalk 3.0 modularized most core functions (beyond basic features) as plugins, making it easier to manage services for different schools;

rich_text.plain_text: Chalk 3.0 modularized most core functions (beyond basic features) as plugins, making it easier to manage services for different schools;

text.content: It also provided pathways for custom plugin development, allowing integration with third-party plugins or websites to meet more personalized needs.

rich_text.plain_text: It also provided pathways for custom plugin development, allowing integration with third-party plugins or websites to meet more personalized needs.

text.content: Improving Each User's Work Efficiency

rich_text.plain_text: Improving Each User's Work Efficiency

text.content: Providing cross-scenario interaction tools like to-do lists, schedules, messages, notifications, and global search to handle most daily user events. Examples include: leave approvals, homework submissions, school notifications, grade report messages, attendance reminders, etc.;

rich_text.plain_text: Providing cross-scenario interaction tools like to-do lists, schedules, messages, notifications, and global search to handle most daily user events. Examples include: leave approvals, homework submissions, school notifications, grade report messages, attendance reminders, etc.;

text.content: Adding a customizable shortcut area allowing users to define their frequently used functions.

rich_text.plain_text: Adding a customizable shortcut area allowing users to define their frequently used functions.

text.content: Usage Statistics

rich_text.plain_text: Usage Statistics

text.content: The image shows Shenzhen Middle School's usage in 2021. Since implementing the "Grade 10 Teaching" system in September 2020, various departments gradually adopted Seiue for teaching management; students can request leave, select courses, and check grades online; teachers can record attendance, evaluate and approve requests; parents can view records and approve leave requests.

rich_text.plain_text: The image shows Shenzhen Middle School's usage in 2021. Since implementing the "Grade 10 Teaching" system in September 2020, various departments gradually adopted Seiue for teaching management; students can request leave, select courses, and check grades online; teachers can record attendance, evaluate and approve requests; parents can view records and approve leave requests.

text.content: After launching at Peking University Affiliated High School, the new system received positive feedback from the chemistry, biology, and mentor groups of teachers, and student feedback was also positive. We collaborated with the mentor group on the joint design of student records.

rich_text.plain_text: After launching at Peking University Affiliated High School, the new system received positive feedback from the chemistry, biology, and mentor groups of teachers, and student feedback was also positive. We collaborated with the mentor group on the joint design of student records.

text.content: 1.2 Specific Project Example: Process Evaluation

rich_text.plain_text: 1.2 Specific Project Example: Process Evaluation

text.content: My Role: Product Manager + Experience Designer

rich_text.plain_text: My Role: Product Manager + Experience Designer

text.content: Project Background

rich_text.plain_text: Project Background

text.content: Traditional evaluation methods overemphasize static, quantitative, and superficial learning outcomes, with one-sided content and singular evaluation methods. This "one-shot decision" approach is not conducive to learners' comprehensive development.

rich_text.plain_text: Traditional evaluation methods overemphasize static, quantitative, and superficial learning outcomes, with one-sided content and singular evaluation methods. This "one-shot decision" approach is not conducive to learners' comprehensive development.

text.content: Process Evaluation is a key focus of new curriculum teaching reform.

rich_text.plain_text: Process Evaluation is a key focus of new curriculum teaching reform.

text.content: Dynamic, comprehensive evaluation

rich_text.plain_text: Dynamic, comprehensive evaluation

text.content: provides teachers and students with actionable insights, using assessment for educational purposes and better evaluating non-intellectual learning performances such as curiosity, exploration, and effort.

rich_text.plain_text: provides teachers and students with actionable insights, using assessment for educational purposes and better evaluating non-intellectual learning performances such as curiosity, exploration, and effort.

text.content: Based on the new Chalk 3.0 framework, the process evaluation scenario, as a core part of blended teaching, required new perspectives and thinking.

rich_text.plain_text: Based on the new Chalk 3.0 framework, the process evaluation scenario, as a core part of blended teaching, required new perspectives and thinking.

text.content: Through user research and analysis of the old product, we identified the following issues that needed to be addressed:

text.content: Design Goals

rich_text.plain_text: Design Goals

text.content: Enrich evaluation forms, combining qualitative and quantitative approaches;

rich_text.plain_text: Enrich evaluation forms, combining qualitative and quantitative approaches;

text.content: Increase evaluation structure flexibility, supporting personalized encouraging assessments;

rich_text.plain_text: Increase evaluation structure flexibility, supporting personalized encouraging assessments;

text.content: Connect various business scenarios, linking homework, attendance, classroom performance and other dimensions with process evaluation to create a three-dimensional view of student performance with timely feedback;

rich_text.plain_text: Connect various business scenarios, linking homework, attendance, classroom performance and other dimensions with process evaluation to create a three-dimensional view of student performance with timely feedback;

text.content: Simplify interaction models, optimize visual styles, making the evaluation model easier to understand.

rich_text.plain_text: Simplify interaction models, optimize visual styles, making the evaluation model easier to understand.

rich_text.plain_text: Teacher Evaluation Input

rich_text.plain_text: Optimized multi-line comment input experience, with Enter key or button to quickly switch to the next line;

rich_text.plain_text: Performance Analysis and Activity

text.content: User Feedback

rich_text.plain_text: User Feedback

text.content: After this feature launched, Peking University Affiliated High School and Shenzhen Middle School created personalized evaluation structures based on their subject characteristics, began daily input and publishing work, and students actively monitored their performance changes on Chalk, communicating with teachers about the results.

rich_text.plain_text: After this feature launched, Peking University Affiliated High School and Shenzhen Middle School created personalized evaluation structures based on their subject characteristics, began daily input and publishing work, and students actively monitored their performance changes on Chalk, communicating with teachers about the results.

text.content: Peking University Affiliated High School transferred their homework assignment tool from Office 365 to Chalk, finding the connection between evaluation and homework systems very effective.

rich_text.plain_text: Peking University Affiliated High School transferred their homework assignment tool from Office 365 to Chalk, finding the connection between evaluation and homework systems very effective.

text.content: In post-launch feedback, most product designs were well-received, which stemmed from pre-design research and post-design validation. Beyond the many satisfied user comments, there were also several constructive ideas that will be prioritized for future optimization.

rich_text.plain_text: In post-launch feedback, most product designs were well-received, which stemmed from pre-design research and post-design validation. Beyond the many satisfied user comments, there were also several constructive ideas that will be prioritized for future optimization.

text.content: 2. Design System Construction and Collaboration

rich_text.plain_text: 2. Design System Construction and Collaboration

text.content: My Role: Project Initiator + Plan Developer + Core Framework Builder

rich_text.plain_text: My Role: Project Initiator + Plan Developer + Core Framework Builder

text.content: Project Background

rich_text.plain_text: Project Background

text.content:
During the initial building stage of Chalk 3.0, time constraints and limited personnel led to a somewhat rough design system lacking global consideration.
By the end of 2020, when the framework development was completed, I decided to launch a design system optimization plan to improve design and development efficiency and support future system theming.

rich_text.plain_text:
During the initial building stage of Chalk 3.0, time constraints and limited personnel led to a somewhat rough design system lacking global consideration.
By the end of 2020, when the framework development was completed, I decided to launch a design system optimization plan to improve design and development efficiency and support future system theming.

text.content: Old Design System Problem Analysis

rich_text.plain_text: Old Design System Problem Analysis

text.content: Framework Optimization Strategy

rich_text.plain_text: Framework Optimization Strategy

text.content: Using color as the smallest unit, we named colors for various functions, used color tokens to compose backgrounds, borders and other attributes, combined various attributes to form different materials, and achieved system-wide theming through customization of color tokens.

rich_text.plain_text: Using color as the smallest unit, we named colors for various functions, used color tokens to compose backgrounds, borders and other attributes, combined various attributes to form different materials, and achieved system-wide theming through customization of color tokens.

text.content: By simply changing token style values, an entire skin could be quickly defined

rich_text.plain_text: By simply changing token style values, an entire skin could be quickly defined

text.content: In the scenario library, we managed scenario pages by type, added usage descriptions for scenarios and modes, and provided guidance for product design. Ideally, some simple business cases could be prototyped by product managers directly using the scenario library to interface with development, without requiring design drawings.

rich_text.plain_text: In the scenario library, we managed scenario pages by type, added usage descriptions for scenarios and modes, and provided guidance for product design. Ideally, some simple business cases could be prototyped by product managers directly using the scenario library to interface with development, without requiring design drawings.

rich_text.plain_text: Partial Design Token structure, scenario template structure

text.content: 3. Product Development Process Optimization

rich_text.plain_text: 3. Product Development Process Optimization

text.content: My Work: Researching team issues, formulating new processes, collaborating with stakeholders on decisions and implementation

rich_text.plain_text: My Work: Researching team issues, formulating new processes, collaborating with stakeholders on decisions and implementation

text.content: Project Background

rich_text.plain_text: Project Background

text.content: Under Seiue team's old product development process, the following common issues existed:

rich_text.plain_text: Under Seiue team's old product development process, the following common issues existed:

text.content: Designers over-relied on upstream requirements, resulting in solutions lacking leadership and foresight;

rich_text.plain_text: Designers over-relied on upstream requirements, resulting in solutions lacking leadership and foresight;

text.content: Customer success teams transmitted requirements incorrectly, product managers lacked deep scenario understanding, causing problems to go undetected;

rich_text.plain_text: Customer success teams transmitted requirements incorrectly, product managers lacked deep scenario understanding, causing problems to go undetected;

text.content: Development partners implemented against requirements without leveraging their technical perspective for more creative solutions;

rich_text.plain_text: Development partners implemented against requirements without leveraging their technical perspective for more creative solutions;

text.content: Lack of user validation phases led to high costs for post-launch optimization.

rich_text.plain_text: Lack of user validation phases led to high costs for post-launch optimization.

text.content: Optimization Directions

rich_text.plain_text: Optimization Directions

text.content: To solve process issues, we needed to consider multiple perspectives including company goals, product objectives, and stakeholder inputs/outputs. After proposing several possible directions and discussing with management and team members, we jointly determined the optimization directions:

rich_text.plain_text: To solve process issues, we needed to consider multiple perspectives including company goals, product objectives, and stakeholder inputs/outputs. After proposing several possible directions and discussing with management and team members, we jointly determined the optimization directions:

text.content: Added scenario descriptions to requirement documents from customer success partners, helping the product team quickly understand the full scenario;

rich_text.plain_text: Added scenario descriptions to requirement documents from customer success partners, helping the product team quickly understand the full scenario;

text.content: Product design team conducted research at key schools to deepen scenario understanding;

rich_text.plain_text: Product design team conducted research at key schools to deepen scenario understanding;

text.content: Split product design deliverables into "Product Framework Documents" and "Product Documents," adding framework stage synchronization, communicating deliverables at each stage with customer success and development teams to identify requirement and implementation issues earlier;

rich_text.plain_text: Split product design deliverables into "Product Framework Documents" and "Product Documents," adding framework stage synchronization, communicating deliverables at each stage with customer success and development teams to identify requirement and implementation issues earlier;

text.content: Added user interviews and validation phases before and after design to collect more user information.

rich_text.plain_text: Added user interviews and validation phases before and after design to collect more user information.

text.content: Notable Changes Under the New Process

rich_text.plain_text: Notable Changes Under the New Process

text.content: In product design, more conversations centered around: "Is there a better solution for this scenario?" instead of fixating on specific requirement points;

rich_text.plain_text: In product design, more conversations centered around: "Is there a better solution for this scenario?" instead of fixating on specific requirement points;

text.content: Multi-party confirmation at each stage clarified direction, reducing rework in later phases;

rich_text.plain_text: Multi-party confirmation at each stage clarified direction, reducing rework in later phases;

text.content: Each role contributed their agency to the product solution, bringing more perspectives and smoother communication;

rich_text.plain_text: Each role contributed their agency to the product solution, bringing more perspectives and smoother communication;

text.content: User interviews and validation before and after design, as well as solution optimization based on user feedback, increased designers' judgment basis and confidence, leading to greater user acceptance and trust in the launched product.

rich_text.plain_text: User interviews and validation before and after design, as well as solution optimization based on user feedback, increased designers' judgment basis and confidence, leading to greater user acceptance and trust in the launched product.
